header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.topics: Operation, teenagers, school, detention, visiting friends, cancer, bank/building society, planning work
header.activity: Catching up with a friend (who is also my cleaner)
header.conv_type: Discussing, explaining, inquiring, complaining, advising, anecdote telling, making arrangements
